name: The Snow Queen is Uncool
summary: It's winter solstice, and Berta should be out there doing her job as an arbiter of mortals, but she prefers to laze around at home instead. This terrible character flaw has almost led to her disappearing from humanity's radar! On her own, she'll have no idea how to fix this... Thankfully, her loyal, brilliant, enterprising and very humble manager knows just the way to save her from obscurity.
